name: AVCaptureSession.InterruptionReason
desc: Constants identifying the reason a capture session was interrupted, found in an AVCaptureSessionWasInterrupted user info dictionary.

items.name: case videoDeviceNotAvailableInBackground
items.desc: An interruption caused by the app being sent to the background while using a camera.

items.name: case audioDeviceInUseByAnotherClient
items.desc: An interruption caused by the audio hardware temporarily being made unavailable (for example, for a phone call or alarm).

items.name: case videoDeviceInUseByAnotherClient
items.desc: An interruption caused by the video device temporarily being made unavailable (for example, when used by another capture session).

items.name: case videoDeviceNotAvailableWithMultipleForegroundApps
items.desc: An interruption caused when your app is running in Slide Over, Split View, or Picture in Picture mode on iPad.

items.name: case videoDeviceNotAvailableDueToSystemPressure
items.desc: An interruption due to system pressure, such as thermal duress.
